title: Glossier’s Black Friday Deals Are Here—And We’re Screaming
description: Get up to 30 percent off fragrances, makeup, body care, and more.

text: Breaking news: Glossier’s Black Friday sale is back, and it’s here even earlier this year. As of today, you’re able to shop the cool-girl brand’s inventory at a major discount. The sale runs until December 2, but considering the staggering popularity of Glossier (and the number of super-hyped launches it’s rolled out this year), it’d probably be a good idea to shop sooner rather than later. We’ve all had the sad experience of clicking the checkout button, only to find that one or more items in your cart have sold out, and we definitely don’t want that to happen to you.Just like last year’s sale, Glossier is offering 25 percent off—plus a whopping 30 percent off if you spend $100 or more. Dying to get your hands on the new fragrances Glossier You Doux and Glossier You Rêve? Yep, those qualify too! Sadly, there are a few exceptions, and the discount doesn’t apply to any sets, merch, or gift cards. That includes holiday kits as well, although we’re grateful that you can still snag one of our favorite gift sets of the season, the Limited Edition Balm Dotcom Duo, on sale. html:
Breaking news: Glossier’s Black Friday sale is back, and it’s here even earlier this year. As of today, you’re able to shop the cool-girl brand’s inventory at a major discount. The sale runs until December 2, but considering the staggering popularity of Glossier (and the number of super-hyped launches it’s rolled out this year), it’d probably be a good idea to shop sooner rather than later. We’ve all had the sad experience of clicking the checkout button, only to find that one or more items in your cart have sold out, and we definitely don’t want that to happen to you.

Just like last year’s sale, Glossier is offering 25 percent off—plus a whopping 30 percent off if you spend $100 or more. There genuinely isn’t a better time of year to stock up on staples or try a few new products you’ve had your eye on. Are you an OG fan of Boy Brow? Of course that’s on sale. Dying to get your hands on the new fragrances Glossier You Doux and Glossier You Rêve? Yep, those qualify too! Sadly, there are a few exceptions, and the discount doesn’t apply to any sets, merch, or gift cards. That includes holiday kits as well, although we’re grateful that you can still snag one of our favorite gift sets of the season, the Limited Edition Balm Dotcom Duo, on sale.

As beauty editors, we’ve had the incredible opportunity to try pretty much every fragrance, skin care, makeup, and body care product Glossier has to offer. To be honest, Glossier is one of those rare brands where we love pretty much everything. However, if you were to force us to choose, even though it’s kind of like picking our favorite children, there are a couple of Glossier products we consider to be absolute must-trys and deserving of your coin. Keep scrolling to discover formulas that’ll become your future beauty essentials, too. You’re welcome in advance.

Fragrance

Glossier’s biggest, most-anticipated launches of 2024 were the new Glossier You fragrances. If you had the willpower to wait until they were on sale, this is your sign to grab them at 25 percent off; plus, if you get two (or even all three), you’ll get that coveted 30 percent discount. Don’t ignore the candles, either—they smell divine and last a surprisingly long time.

Skincare

Glossier has always had more of a skin-first approach. After all, it’s always easier to look good when you have a great foundation. Now, you can save on all of the brand’s skin care items, including the fan-favorite Milky Jelly Cleanser (which I’ve personally loved since about 2017) and the new solid version of Futuredew, a nourishing, glow-giving oil-serum hybrid.

Makeup

One undeniable truth: Glossier was one of the early brands that helped usher in this new wave of “no-makeup makeup” after the full-coverage, cut crease-happy days of the mid-2010s. The brand has stayed true to its original ethos over the years, while also playing with different colors and finishes to create some true classics in the makeup category.

Body

You can’t forget about the rest of your body! A few months ago, the brand came out with Crème de You, a body cream that smells exactly like the Glossier You perfume; as someone who can’t get enough of ultra-rich body moisturizers and adores the scent, I may just have to stockpile a few of those myself. Other notable items include the deodorant and the Body Hero Exfoliating Bar, which gently gets rid of rough patches and dead skin cells for ultra-soft skin. Thank goodness you can try all of these and more at a discount for the next few days.
